notes: Locales must be specified separately by prefixing the locale name with `Intl.~locale`, eg `Intl.~locale.en-GB`.
detectSource: 'Intl' in self && Intl.Collator && Intl.Collator.supportedLocalesOf && Intl.Collator.supportedLocalesOf('en-LC').length === 1 && Intl.DateTimeFormat && Intl.DateTimeFormat.supportedLocalesOf && Intl.DateTimeFormat.supportedLocalesOf('en-LC').length === 1 && Intl.NumberFormat && Intl.NumberFormat.supportedLocalesOf && Intl.NumberFormat.supportedLocalesOf('en-LC').length === 1
